title: Reflective blue sweatpants
body_html:
Reflective Sweatpants

Perfect-fit sweatpants in a bold blue color, designed for both comfort and style.

Featuring reflective Phantom badges on both the front and back for a standout detail under the light.

title: Cupid black shirt
body_html: Black oversized shirt featuring a bold red zipper running down the back. The design showcases a white graphic of Cupid aiming his bow,Finished with a red “PHANTOM” logo on the upper back for a clean front look.

title: Pink miami
body_html:
PINK MIAMI – Oversized Polo Shirt

A bold clash of contrast and calm, pink miami is crafted in a heavyweight cotton blend with an oversized silhouette that drapes with presence. The monochrome palette of black and pink slices through the body with sharp angles, echoing duality and balance.

Featuring Phantom’s signature logos front and center, this piece blends streetwear aggression with vintage sportswear attitude.

 

Details:

 

  • Oversized fit
  • Embroidered Phantom badge and star emblem
  • Polo collar with button placket
  • Custom-cut panels in black on pink
  • Midweight breathable fabric for structure and flow

title: GHOST layer blue tee
body_html:
The Ghost Layer Tee brings a bold twist to a classic long-sleeve look with its double-layered sleeve design. Featuring Phantom’s signature ghostly distressing and contrast stitching, this tee creates a dynamic, layered effect that adds depth and movement. Available in Blue Phantom and Dark Phantom, it’s a versatile piece that blends edge with effortless style.

 

Perfect for pairing with Ghost Denim or Geo Denim, this tee embodies Phantom’s signature fusion of raw energy and modern streetwear aesthetics.

body_html:

title: PHNTM WRLD white tee
body_html:
The PHNTM WRLD Jersey Tee takes inspiration from vintage motorsport aesthetics, featuring a bold panel design with racing-inspired typography. Designed in a white and blue colorway, it delivers a clean yet striking look that represents the fast-paced world of Phantom.

 

Crafted from premium heavyweight cotton, this tee ensures durability and comfort, making it the perfect statement piece for both casual wear and elevated streetwear fits. Whether styled with oversized denim or layered under a jacket, the PHNTM WRLD tee is built for movement, energy, and the spirit of competition.

title: Blue Phantom Geo Denim
body_html:
The Geo Denim Pants redefine modern streetwear with bold design and premium craftsmanship. Made from heavyweight denim, they feature curved contrast stitching that creates a dynamic, flowing effect, adding depth and movement to the silhouette.

 

Available in three distinct washes—Dark Indigo, Washed Black, and Phantom Wave (Medium Blue)—each pair offers a unique character while maintaining a cohesive aesthetic. Versatile and effortlessly stylish, they complement oversized tees, layered outfits, and statement footwear.

 

With a balance of durability, comfort, and standout design, the Geo Denim Pants embody Phantom’s signature fusion of streetwear and contemporary style.

title: Black Washed Ghost Denim
body_html:
The Ghost Denim Pants embody Phantom’s signature fusion of raw edge and contemporary design. Featuring bold frayed ghost motifs throughout, these jeans redefine distressed denim with a unique, rebellious aesthetic.

 

Crafted from premium heavyweight denim, they are available in three distinctive washes—Dirty Green, Washed Black, and Light Blue—each offering a distinct personality while maintaining a cohesive look. The heavy distressing and intricate detailing add texture and depth, making these jeans a true statement piece.

 

Designed for versatility, the Ghost Denim Pants pair effortlessly with oversized jackets, fitted tops, and standout footwear, making them a bold addition to any streetwear wardrobe.
